about:
Welcome to my portfolio! 

 I'm a self-taught web developer embarking on this journey with nearly a decade of experience in the Finance industry. After a successful career in management, I decided solving complex problems as an independent contributor is my passion. 

 I previously completed two programming retreats at the Recurse Center, built a number of solo and collaborative projects, and volunteered for some local causes to gain experience with an existing code base. Now, I'm ready to begin my first professional role as a full-stack or front-end software engineer for a company that values my self-motivation and eagerness to learn.

projects.name: RC Collaborator
projects.description: Full-stack application for Recursers to showcase projects and foster collaboration. Implemented authentication OAuth, established end-to-end and unit tests, created a responsive UI, and established a CI/CD pipeline.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Personal portfolio to showcase about information, projects, skills and contact details. Built with custom webpack configuration without using create-react-app. Implemented responsive design.

projects.name: GitHub Star Tagger
projects.description: Application that fetches starred reponsitories from GitHub's REST API. Allows users to add tags to the repos to categorize them to make them easier to find.

projects.name: Cost of Drinking
projects.description: Interactive map displaying the cost of living index based on beer prices. Scraped, cleaned, and merged data from multiple sources. Joined the data with geographical information and created dataframes.

projects.name: MST Waypoint Converter
projects.description: Conversion tool for the Mountains to Sea Trail, a local nonprofit, to map waypoint data to the closest corresponding trackpoint. Converts data into a standardized CSV format for download.

projects.name: NC Nonprofit Job Scraper
projects.description: Tool which scrapes new nonprofit jobs from an NC job site and sends results as a Telegram message.

projects.name: "Pearl"-sonal Finance Tool
projects.description: Personal Finance Flowchart built at the Pearl Hacks 2021 Hackathon for educating college students about personal finance. Contains a checklist with steps to establish your finances and educational resources with more information.

projects.name: Etch-A-Sketch
projects.description: Etch-A-Sketch created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to learn about CSS Grid.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: Calculator created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript including keyboard shortcuts
